Description:
Deliver business value through Right and Fast partnershipKey Responsibilities:-Design and development of microservice with spring boot framework-Writing Unit test coverage with Junit framework.-Work closely with peers such as Architects, Product Security Leads, Product Managers, external vendors, and partners to meet product requirements.-  Proven experience performing root cause analysis of security events and incidents- Ensure alignment with our Cloud DevOps model based on 100% automation and adoption of repeatable patterns that can be leveraged across the organization.YOU MUST HAVE·Bachelor’s degree in engineering or Computer Science· EXP-5+years·Must be strong in writing logical programming·3+ year’s work experience in Java- J2EE - Spring Boot Framework·3+ year’s work experience in Junit test case writing·3+ year’s work experience in Kafka, Docker & Kubernetes·3+ year’s work experience with Agile principles·3+ year’s work experience with SQL Server or PostgreSQL·3+ year’s work experience with version control Tools – git/bitbucket, Jenkins and DevOps toolset.1+ year’s work experience with Atlassian tools – JIRA, ConfluenceYOU MUST HAVE·Bachelors degree in Engineering or Computer ScienceWE VALUE:·System understanding of metering and related products like MDC, MDM.·Knowledge on communication protocols DLMS, IDIS, G3PLC, WMBUS SQL·Knowledge Azure·Python programming·Knowledge on Data Lake & Mongo DB·Knowledge on React js·Knowledge on Android developmentJOB ID: req415507
